name: Master Blaster
description:
A vertical shoot-em-up published only on the cover-tape of the Crash Magazine, issue 75.
It was developed by the company behind Xecutor, a very similar game. However, Master Blaster features various changes in gameplay, such as parts of the level that need to be destroyed or energy fields that turn off and on requiring you to precisely time when to get through them.
The game is more difficult as well, with faster enemies and bosses which feature different attacks.
